text: ZenQMS is a cloud-based software platform, that life sciences companies use to manage critical to quality activities.

We're 50 to a hundred employees today
and we've been growing really steadily really for the last 13 years.
Our clients are exclusively in the life sciences space,
which is a really challenging space to sell software into.

How can we help people develop better, safer drugs
by using a better process for managing their documents,

manage training, manage deviation, investigations,
change controls, and even audits.
From a compliance perspective, AWS is out front.
The transparency and the commitment to reach for security certificates that help us when we have discussions with FDA,
with folks that are concerned about privacy, is really very helpful.

We have a lot of data from clients who especially are audit driven,
who have basically the ability to say

I've gone from a two or three day inspection with a lot of findings
to the inspection was only a couple hours,

I was able to answer everybody's questions
and there were no findings.
And that's great because I really feel like we are part of the solution that hopefully is delivering safer, better drugs to all of us.

Working with AWS is more than just buying
computing power or servers.
It's actually building a technological relationship and a foundation

that will only enhance your business
and your flexibility going forward.
